attributes.action: Allow 4 Rifles to come home from Afghanistan as planned at the end of this month (September 09)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our lads have been out in Afghanistan for 4 months now. They went out as Election Support. They are due to come home the end of September however it has recently been advised that they might have to stay out there longer. These lads have been messed about with this tour so much already and most of them have had no RNR! We would like the lads to return home as planned at the end of September! Thanks

rejection.details: Please provide your full name on your petition and resubmit.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
